question: The "Irminger Sea" is located in which ocean?
explanation: Irminger Sea is located in the North Atlantic Ocean. Greenland, the autonomous territory of Denmark, and Iceland form the basin territories of the Irminger Sea. Irminger Current is located in this sea. The Denmark Strait, between Greenland and Iceland, connects the Irminger Sea to the Greenland Sea. In Cape Farewell, the southernmost tip of Greenland, Irminger Sea meets the Labrador Sea. Irminger Sea is one of the main fishing areas of the Rose Fish.
